Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description

Ember 25 40 100 A weak fire attack that may inflict a burn.
Flamethrower 15 90 100 A powerful fire attack that may inflict a burn.
Fire Spin 15 35 85 Traps the foe in a ring of fire for 2 to 5 turns.
Fire Blast 5 110 85 Incinerates everything it strikes. May cause a burn.
Flame Wheel 25 60 100 A fiery charge attack that may inflict a burn.
Sacred Fire 5 100 95 A mystical fire attack that may inflict a burn.
Sunny Day 5 0 Boosts the power of FIRE- type moves for 5 turns.
Heat Wave 10 100 90 Exhales a hot breath on the foe. May inflict a burn.
Will-o-Wisp 15 85 Inflicts a burn on the foe with intense fire.
Eruption 5 150 100 The higher the user's HP, the more damage caused.
Blaze Kick 10 85 90 A kick with a high critical- hit ratio. May cause a burn.
Blast Burn 5 150 90 Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.
Overheat 5 130 90 Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers Sp. Atk.
Flare Blitz 15 120 100 A charge that may burn the foe. Also hurts the user.
Fire Fang 15 65 95 May cause flinching or leave the foe with a burn.
Lava Plume 15 80 100 Scarlet flames torch everything around the user.
Magma Storm 5 100 75 Traps the foe in a vortex of fire for 2 to 5 turns.
Flame Burst 15 70 100 A bursting flame that does damage to all foes.
Flame Charge 20 50 100 Attacks in a cloak of flames. Raises Speed.
Incinerate 15 60 100 Burns up Berries and Gems preventing their use.
Inferno 5 100 50 Powerful and sure to inflict a burn, but inaccurate.
Fire Pledge 10 80 100 Attacks with a column of fire. May burn the grass.
Heat Crash 10 1 100 Does more damage if the user outweighs the foe.
Searing Shot 5 100 100 Scarlet flames torch everything around the user.
Blue Flare 5 130 85 Engulfs the foe in a blue flame. May inflict a burn.
Fiery Dance 10 80 100 Dances cloaked in flames. May raise Sp. Atk.
V-Create 5 180 95 Very powerful, but lowers Defense, Sp. Def and Speed.
Fusion Flare 5 100 100 Summons a fireball. Works well with a thunderbolt.
Mystical Fire 10 75 100 Breathes a special, hot fire. May lower Sp. Atk.
Fire Lash 15 80 100 Whips the foe with fire lowering its Defense.
Burn Up 5 130 100 Burns out the user fully removing the Fire type.
Shell Trap 5 150 100 Sets a shell trap that damages on contact.
Mind Blown 5 150 100 It explodes the user's head to damage everything around.
Sizzly Slide 15 90 100 User cloaked in fire charges. Leaves the foe with a burn.
Pyro Ball 5 120 90 Launches a fiery ball at the target. It may cause a burn.
Burning Jealousy 5 70 100 Foes that have stats upped during the turn get burned.
Thermal Void 15 75 90 Absorbs thermal energy to regain half of the damage.
Pyroclasm 5 0 Pressurizes the battlefield tosummon an arid heat wave.
Magma Terrain 10 0 Cuts physical damage and boosts Fire damage.
